Perceptor::

Perceptor yelled for Maxima's slash and the wound wasn't very 
serious. Looking with rage to Maxima and MEgatron and after he heard 
that he replied "Not here, I can assure you... I don't have a clue 
who're them or where they are and I DON'T CARE"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> More evil laughter escaped Megatron Revived's voice processors.  
She is definatly Leader material.
> "If you are trying to get to an important point, please do so 
now.  If I am supposed to remember you, you'll have to schedule a 
time for us to, sit down and chat.  But right now I fear my family 
is in dire straits.  To the point-"
> The massive and powerful transformer showed a little of his speed 
when he closed the gap between them in a mere two seconds.
> "Tell me were the bounty hunters Malice and Organics are." he said 
simply, no longer enjoying this very entertaining conversation.
> 
> MaximaSR74@a... wrote:
> Hissing at Perceptor, she tired of him. 
> 
> Taking a step back, but in a swift motion, slashed at him... 
across his neck down his chest. "I DON'T take too kindly to 
disrespect, Perceptor," she growled. 
> 
> Jumping back to avoid any attack he may attempt.. but her optics 
turned to glare up at the Clone. "Just because you have the 
Decepticon Matrix does NOT make you Megatron! Leader.. yes... albeit 
a fleeting one," she purred with malice. 
> 
> "Though... Perceptor speaks the truth in one way," as her arm 
waved to the side in a graceful manner. "Hydras is leader here. And 
he is far better a leader than Starscream." Grinning up at the 
clone. How she hated Starscream... to the point she would often 
torture & tease him. Though, she at first was teased.. but that 
didn't remain the case ... as she was one of Megatron's top Autobot 
assasins. 
> 
> Clasping her clawed hands behind her, standing tall... "You are 
also very bold to presume I am not all that knowledgable about 
Decepticons.. Leige Maximo.. both Matrixes... or even Megatron & 
Galvatron... & many others." her crimson optics flashed briefly. 
This was indeed an interesting challenge. 
>
